name: THEY SPEAK FROM THE ABYSS - Teaser Demo
name_original: THEY SPEAK FROM THE ABYSS - Teaser Demo
description:
A demo for the terrifying RPG THEY SPEAK FROM THE ABYSS

Warning: Contains violence, gore, body horror, depictions of suffering and abuse

Lost in a cursed world

Surrounded by the tortured souls of the damned

Is the only way out truly a baptism in blood?
